oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Assortment of Civil War artifacts
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: These items reflect the occupation and presence of Civil War soldiers in Gibson County, Tennessee during the Civil War. The items recovered include clay marbles, a lice comb, a clay pipe bowl, an iron buckle [probably from a blanket strap from a McClellan saddle], a remnant of a table knife blade and handle, a civilian button, and a US staff officer button.
